body.p:
Boone County Ky April 16/61
To His Excellency Hon B McGoffin

Whereas R B Acra has been indicted and fined the sum of Fifty dollars for selling whiskey to minors the circumstances in the case are as follows A young man by the name of Hicks has been to every tavern in this county with the exception of one or two and purchased whiskey on his own account and then went before the Grand Jury and informed on them thereby causing them to be fined

Mr Hicks is now over 21 years of age but was married before he was of legal age; he had at the time of his appearance before the grand jury, the appearance of being 22 or 23 years old he has considerable beard and very much the appearance of a man
Therefore under the circumstances we the undersigned citizens of this county do respectfully pray you to remit the fine

Almorien Perkins
